quest.name: My First Needle
journal: Redolent Rose would like to assign you your first task as a weaver.

Satisfied with your ability to hold the needle he gave you, Redolent Rose would now like to see if you can use it. He has tasked you with preparing a spindle of hempen yarn, for which you will require moko grass and lightning shards. While the grass can be purchased from the guild supplier, the shards must be obtained elsewhere. Craft a spindle of hempen yarn and deliver it to the guildmaster.

After a brief inspection, Redolent Rose acknowledges your ability to follow instructions. He bids you return for your next lesson once you have achieved basic proficiency.

※The next weaver quest will be available from Redolent Rose upon reaching level 5.
objectives: Deliver a spindle of hempen yarn to Redolent Rose.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Well, well...you look like you were born to hold one of those.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Even so, I suggest you keep it somewhere safe─especially when clambering over haystacks─as I shan't be issuing you another.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Now, you certainly look the part, but it remains to be seen if you can play it. I bid you craft me a spindle of hempen yarn.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: A trifling task, yes? Well, I do hope you find it so.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: ...Should it seem even remotely testing, you have no future at this guild.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: To make hempen yarn, you will require moko grass and lightning shards. The former can be purchased from our own dear Gigima, the latter you will have to find for yourself.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To synthesize a spindle of hempen yarn for Redolent Rose, select Logs from the main menu, followed by Crafting Log.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Gigima can provide the moko grass, but you must procure the lightning shards.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Or have you made your yarn already?

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Well bless my soul! SheHe can follow basic instructions!

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: It would seem you have grasped the fundamentals. Good girlboy.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Yarn and cloth may be mere materials, but they must be crafted with no less care than a whole garment.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: For though the finest garments are greater than the sum of their parts, their parts are invariably the finest.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Do remember this, Forename, as you continue your training.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Practice making yarn and other simple items, and return once you have attained a basic level of proficiency.

dialogue.name: REDOLENTROSE
dialogue.text: Tedious, I grant you, but necessary─and you did tell me you were ready to suffer.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The next weaver quest will be available from Redolent Rose upon reaching level 5.
